itunes:summary:
Emmy-winning journalist David Pogue of CBS News Sunday Morning explains how to survive global warming — not with doomsday bunkers or going vegan — but how to invest, the types of insurance you should have, and more. Pogue also explains why he thinks China will comply with international carbon standards and why the American worker shortage is unsustainable.
